Name: Destroy The Cubes 2
About the game: Several number cubes on your screen and your challenge is: destroy them all at once! For this you must drop the balls in the right position and direction to find the perfect trajectory Challenge yourself at each level with new mechanics Walls, tunnels and cannons will challenge your physical intuition New mechanics like revolving walls and moving cubes will challenge your accuracy NEW! Level Editor Create your own levels with the new level editor There are several options of cubes, walls, tunnels and cannons for you to create levels and challenge yourself in your own way Unlock all features by completing levels Includes option to save created levels Addictive new events New visual effects in all mechanics Various visual and sound effects will explode your screen with addictive events Make the most of stereo sound effects RESOURCES New visual effects in all mechanics New mechanics like revolving walls and moving cubes New original soundtrack 59 new exclusive levels New level editor with save option Other resources Customization: Change the game color to the one you like best Steam Cloud: Save game to cloud Steam Achievements: 59 Steam achievements
